thread.title: Virat Kohli, Yuvraj Singh, MS Dhoni and Ashish Nehra in an 'awesome foursome' selfie
thread.title_full: Virat Kohli, Yuvraj Singh, MS Dhoni and Ashish Nehra in an 'awesome foursome' selfie - Sports

author: mid-day online correspondent
title: Virat Kohli, Yuvraj Singh, MS Dhoni and Ashish Nehra in an 'awesome foursome' selfie
text:
Virat Kohli with team mates with the trophy after winning the series. Pic/ PTI 
Indian captain Virat Kohli who led his team to a sensational 2-1 T20I series win against England yesterday. It was Indian spinner Yuzvendra Chahal who was the star of the night with an impressive 6 wicket haul that helped him take the man of the match.
Virat Kohli, however, also took the opportunity to credit his team's veteran cricketers - Yuvraj Singh, MS Dhoni and Ashish Nehra - who played pivotal roles during the series.

MS Dhoni and Yuvraj Singh. Pic/ AFP 
Kohli shared a cool photo on Twitter along with the other three with the following caption: What a victory. @YUVSTRONG12 @msdhoni and Ashu Bhai. Well done fellas.
What a victory ð®ð³ ðð®ð³ ð. @YUVSTRONG12 @msdhoni and Ashu Bhai. Well done fellas pic.twitter.com/VF5ANvjLyi 
— Virat Kohli (@imVkohli) February 1, 2017 India earlier won the five-match Test series 4-0 as well as the three-match ODI series 2-1.
